text: Jane Curtin (born September 6, 1947, Massachusetts) is an American comedian and actress. She received several Emmy Awards for her acting. She played Allison Lowell in the sitcom Kate & Allie. She played Mary in 3rd Rock from the Sun. title: Jane Curtin
